title: Mum, 42, had sex with her daughter's school friends, boys aged 14 and 15
text:

A mum has admitted having sex with two of her teenage daughter's friends who were just 14 and 15 at the time.

Coral Lytle had sex with both boys in the autumn of 2017 and was charged with 21 counts relating to the sexual abuse of the two boys.

The 42-year-old faces charges such as sexual intercourse with a minor, oral copulation with a minor and showing porn to a child.

She could receive up to four years in prison after pleading guilty to all 21 felony offences in California last Tuesday.

Prosecutors say the abuse began in September 2017 against a 15-year-old boy before she molested a 14-year-old boy in the first week of October 2017.

(Image: ABC)

One of the victims said they had sex with her three times, the last time on October 5, 2017. However, the abuse stopped when he began to feel guilty about her husband, who has since left her.

Lytle's grooming would involve picking up the victims in her car from parks and even from the boys' own homes after she asked one of the victims to sneak out at night.

She took the underage teenager back to her house and sexually abused him, before dropping him back at his home at around 5am.

The sexual abuse was reportedly uncovered when one of the victims' parents found nudes of Lytle on the boy's phone.

(Image: ABC)

The woman blamed her behavior on low self-esteem and the death of her sister, which she said had left her feeling depressed.

Records show Lytle's husband filed divorce paperwork within days of her arrest.

She now reportedly goes by the surname Blain.

Tuesday was the second time Lytle was set to plea to the offences.

(Image: ABC)

In April, Judge Joseph Kalashian reconsidered an agreement that in exchange for a guilty plea, Lytle would be handed a six-year suspended prison sentence - which would have meant no time behind bars.

After receiving the probation report Kalashian overturned the agreement, according to the Visalia Times Delta.

She will be sentenced on November 4 and could face four years behind bars and a lifetime sex offender registration.
description: Coral Lytle, 42, had sex with both boys in 2017 and has been charged with 21 counts relating to the sexual abuse in California
